channel.title: Need help building a house
channel.description:
I am hoping to make a house that only admin 3's can get into. I need to know the following: 1. How do I place an object in my server 2. How do i make it so only admin 3's can enter doors (if possible). If not, how can i lock it? 3. How do I make my stairs teleport to another place? 4. How can I make carpet, rug, etc, in my house 5. Can I connect walls? 6. Am I able to make a roof?
If you can contribute, that would be greatly appreciated!

item.title: Need help building a house
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

  1. void makeGlobalObject

  2. if (objectID == OBJECT ID HERE && playerRights == 3)
    {
    telePortToX = your coordsX;
    teleportToY = your coordsY;
    }

3)Answered above.

4)void makeGlobalObject

5)Yes.

6)Client sided, no idea how though. Probably not because those are hard coded into the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help building a house
item.dc:creator: @Generalscape Generalscape
item.description:
@Generalscape wrote:

I am hoping to make a house that only admin 3’s can get into. I need to know the following:

  1. How do I place an object in my server
  2. How do i make it so only admin 3’s can enter doors (if possible). If not, how can i lock it?
  3. How do I make my stairs teleport to another place?
  4. How can I make carpet, rug, etc, in my house
  5. Can I connect walls?
  6. Am I able to make a roof?

If you can contribute, that would be greatly appreciated!
